title: Rescue the gnome
content: ll have to pass a DC 15 Persuasion Check. Succeed, and the goblins will leave with Shadowheart's, Karlach's and Gale's approval. The Gnome is still stuck to the windmill, so you'll have to find a way to get him down. Head around to the back of the windmill and enter through the hole in the wall. There are two levers here - the 'Release Brake' Lever and the 'Brake' Lever. Hit the Brake Lever to stop the windmill from spinning.
